patthana20.3:1.1_0: Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:1.1_1: Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:1.1_2: Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:2.1_0: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:2.1_1: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:2.1_2: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:3.1_0: Naāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.3:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.3:5.1_0: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:5.1_1: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:5.1_2: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:6.1_0: Naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana20.3:7.1_0: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.3:8.1_0: Hetuyā pañca …pe… ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.3:9.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.3:10.1_1: ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.3:11.1_0: Naāsavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.3:12.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.3:13.1_0: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.3:15.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.3:16.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
